amendment.description: To modify the involuntary conversion rules for businesses affected by the September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 659 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 659 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S6451-6456; text as modified: CR S6456) To modify the involuntary conversion rules for businesses affected by the September 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 659 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 659 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Schumer.
